mapper.insert: insert into reservation (order_id, member_id, sitter_id, start_date, start_time, end_date, end_time, total_amount, payment_date, item_name, vat, tid) values( #{order_ID}, #{member_ID}, #{sitter_ID}, #{start_Date}, #{start_Time}, #{end_Date}, #{end_Time}, #{total_amount}, #{payment_Date}, #{item_Name}, #{vat}, #{tid})
mapper.select:
select r.order_id, s.sitter_photo, s.sitter_nickname, r.start_date, r.start_time, r.end_date, r.end_time
from member m, reservation r,
(select sr.order_id, sm.member_nickname as sitter_nickname, sm.member_photo as sitter_photo from member sm, reservation sr where sr.sitter_id = sm.member_id ) s
where m.member_id = r.member_id and r.order_id = s.order_id and #{member_ID} = r.member_id
group by r.order_id, s.sitter_photo, s.sitter_nickname, r.start_date, r.start_time, r.end_date, r.end_time order by r.start_date desc
select order_id, tid, total_amount from reservation where order_id = #{order_ID}
